ccids.IFACC_CODE, ccids.IFACC_ID, ccids.IFACC_NAME from DFDEVDF0114.FGL_BALANCE balance INNER JOIN DFDEVDF0114.FGL_CCIDS ccids ON balance.ccid = ccids.ccid where balance.id in (3318645300634792613,3318679491927814874,3316996094250300845,3309071592974013669,3310459941776609976) or balance.id in (3309376446152031607,3309933065535082890,3309933453010295981,3309933155286015115) or balance.id in (3309071592955139264,3309071592957236420,3309071592959333575,3309071592959333576,3309071592961430731)

select ID, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, LAST_MODIFIED_BY, LAST_MODIFIED_DATE, LAST_MODIFIED_VERSION, ACCOUNT_ID, ADJUST_INCREASE_MONEY, ADJUST_INCREASING_MONEY, ADJUST_MINUS_MONEY, ADJUST_MINUSING_MONEY, ADM_DIV_CODE, AVI_MONEY, AVING_MONEY, BALANCE_ID, CAN_USE_MONEY, CCID, DISTRIBUTE_FREEZE_MONEY, DISTRIBUTE_FREEZING_MONEY, DISTRIBUTE_MINUS_END_MONEY, DISTRIBUTE_MINUSING_MONEY, DISTRIBUTE_MONEY, DISTRIBUTE_UNFREEZE_MONEY, DISTRIBUTE_UNFREEZING_MONEY, DISTRIBUTING_MONEY, FREEZE_MONEY, FREEZING_MONEY, FROMCTRLID, INCREASE_MONEY, INCREASING_MONEY, MINUS_END_MONEY, MINUS_MONEY, MINUSING_MONEY, MONTH, RECOVER_MONEY, RECOVERING_MONEY, REMARK, SECOND_FROMCTRLID, SUM_ID, UNFREEZE_MONEY, UNFREEZING_MONEY, USE_END_MONEY, USE_MONEY, USING_MONEY, VERIFICATION_MONEY, VERIFICATIONING_MONEY, YEAR from DFDEVDF0114.FGL_BALANCE where ID = #{id}

select ID, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, LAST_MODIFIED_BY, LAST_MODIFIED_DATE, LAST_MODIFIED_VERSION, ACCOUNT_ID, ADJUST_INCREASE_MONEY, ADJUST_INCREASING_MONEY, ADJUST_MINUS_MONEY, ADJUST_MINUSING_MONEY, ADM_DIV_CODE, AVI_MONEY, AVING_MONEY, BALANCE_ID, CAN_USE_MONEY, CCID, DISTRIBUTE_FREEZE_MONEY, DISTRIBUTE_FREEZING_MONEY, DISTRIBUTE_MINUS_END_MONEY, DISTRIBUTE_MINUSING_MONEY, DISTRIBUTE_MONEY, DISTRIBUTE_UNFREEZE_MONEY, DISTRIBUTE_UNFREEZING_MONEY, DISTRIBUTING_MONEY, FREEZE_MONEY, FREEZING_MONEY, FROMCTRLID, INCREASE_MONEY, INCREASING_MONEY, MINUS_END_MONEY, MINUS_MONEY, MINUSING_MONEY, MONTH, RECOVER_MONEY, RECOVERING_MONEY, REMARK, SECOND_FROMCTRLID, SUM_ID, UNFREEZE_MONEY, UNFREEZING_MONEY, USE_END_MONEY, USE_MONEY, USING_MONEY, VERIFICATION_MONEY, VERIFICATIONING_MONEY, YEAR from DFDEVDF0114.FGL_BALANCE limit #{offset}, #{limit}

select ID, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, LAST_MODIFIED_BY, LAST_MODIFIED_DATE, LAST_MODIFIED_VERSION, ACCOUNT_ID, ADJUST_INCREASE_MONEY, ADJUST_INCREASING_MONEY, ADJUST_MINUS_MONEY, ADJUST_MINUSING_MONEY, ADM_DIV_CODE, AVI_MONEY, AVING_MONEY, BALANCE_ID, CAN_USE_MONEY, CCID, DISTRIBUTE_FREEZE_MONEY, DISTRIBUTE_FREEZING_MONEY, DISTRIBUTE_MINUS_END_MONEY, DISTRIBUTE_MINUSING_MONEY, DISTRIBUTE_MONEY, DISTRIBUTE_UNFREEZE_MONEY, DISTRIBUTE_UNFREEZING_MONEY, DISTRIBUTING_MONEY, FREEZE_MONEY, FREEZING_MONEY, FROMCTRLID, INCREASE_MONEY, INCREASING_MONEY, MINUS_END_MONEY, MINUS_MONEY, MINUSING_MONEY, MONTH, RECOVER_MONEY, RECOVERING_MONEY, REMARK, SECOND_FROMCTRLID, SUM_ID, UNFREEZE_MONEY, UNFREEZING_MONEY, USE_END_MONEY, USE_MONEY, USING_MONEY, VERIFICATION_MONEY, VERIFICATIONING_MONEY, YEAR from DFDEVDF0114.FGL_BALANCE
mapper.insert: insert into DFDEVDF0114.FGL_BALANCE(CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, LAST_MODIFIED_BY, LAST_MODIFIED_DATE, LAST_MODIFIED_VERSION, ACCOUNT_ID, ADJUST_INCREASE_MONEY, ADJUST_INCREASING_MONEY, ADJUST_MINUS_MONEY, ADJUST_MINUSING_MONEY, ADM_DIV_CODE, AVI_MONEY, AVING_MONEY, BALANCE_ID, CAN_USE_MONEY, CCID, DISTRIBUTE_FREEZE_MONEY, DISTRIBUTE_FREEZING_MONEY, DISTRIBUTE_MINUS_END_MONEY, DISTRIBUTE_MINUSING_MONEY, DISTRIBUTE_MONEY, DISTRIBUTE_UNFREEZE_MONEY, DISTRIBUTE_UNFREEZING_MONEY, DISTRIBUTING_MONEY, FREEZE_MONEY, FREEZING_MONEY, FROMCTRLID, INCREASE_MONEY, INCREASING_MONEY, MINUS_END_MONEY, MINUS_MONEY, MINUSING_MONEY, MONTH, RECOVER_MONEY, RECOVERING_MONEY, REMARK, SECOND_FROMCTRLID, SUM_ID, UNFREEZE_MONEY, UNFREEZING_MONEY, USE_END_MONEY, USE_MONEY, USING_MONEY, VERIFICATION_MONEY, VERIFICATIONING_MONEY, YEAR) values (#{createBy}, #{createDate}, #{lastModifiedBy}, #{lastModifiedDate}, #{lastModifiedVersion}, #{accountId}, #{adjustIncreaseMoney}, #{adjustIncreasingMoney}, #{adjustMinusMoney}, #{adjustMinusingMoney}, #{admDivCode}, #{aviMoney}, #{avingMoney}, #{balanceId}, #{canUseMoney}, #{ccid}, #{distributeFreezeMoney}, #{distributeFreezingMoney}, #{distributeMinusEndMoney}, #{distributeMinusingMoney}, #{distributeMoney}, #{distributeUnfreezeMoney}, #{distributeUnfreezingMoney}, #{distributingMoney}, #{freezeMoney}, #{freezingMoney}, #{fromctrlid}, #{increaseMoney}, #{increasingMoney}, #{minusEndMoney}, #{minusMoney}, #{minusingMoney}, #{month}, #{recoverMoney}, #{recoveringMoney}, #{remark}, #{secondFromctrlid}, #{sumId}, #{unfreezeMoney}, #{unfreezingMoney}, #{useEndMoney}, #{useMoney}, #{usingMoney}, #{verificationMoney}, #{verificationingMoney}, #{year})
mapper.update:
update DFDEVDF0114.FGL_BALANCE
CREATE_BY = #{createBy},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate},
LAST_MODIFIED_BY = #{lastModifiedBy},
LAST_MODIFIED_DATE = #{lastModifiedDate},
LAST_MODIFIED_VERSION = #{lastModifiedVersion},
ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId},
ADJUST_INCREASE_MONEY = #{adjustIncreaseMoney},
ADJUST_INCREASING_MONEY = #{adjustIncreasingMoney},
ADJUST_MINUS_MONEY = #{adjustMinusMoney},
ADJUST_MINUSING_MONEY = #{adjustMinusingMoney},
ADM_DIV_CODE = #{admDivCode},
AVI_MONEY = #{aviMoney},
AVING_MONEY = #{avingMoney},
BALANCE_ID = #{balanceId},
CAN_USE_MONEY = #{canUseMoney},
CCID = #{ccid},
DISTRIBUTE_FREEZE_MONEY = #{distributeFreezeMoney},
DISTRIBUTE_FREEZING_MONEY = #{distributeFreezingMoney},
DISTRIBUTE_MINUS_END_MONEY = #{distributeMinusEndMoney},
DISTRIBUTE_MINUSING_MONEY = #{distributeMinusingMoney},
DISTRIBUTE_MONEY = #{distributeMoney},
DISTRIBUTE_UNFREEZE_MONEY = #{distributeUnfreezeMoney},
DISTRIBUTE_UNFREEZING_MONEY = #{distributeUnfreezingMoney},
DISTRIBUTING_MONEY = #{distributingMoney},
FREEZE_MONEY = #{freezeMoney},
FREEZING_MONEY = #{freezingMoney},
FROMCTRLID = #{fromctrlid},
INCREASE_MONEY = #{increaseMoney},
INCREASING_MONEY = #{increasingMoney},
MINUS_END_MONEY = #{minusEndMoney},
MINUS_MONEY = #{minusMoney},
MINUSING_MONEY = #{minusingMoney},
MONTH = #{month},
RECOVER_MONEY = #{recoverMoney},
RECOVERING_MONEY = #{recoveringMoney},
REMARK = #{remark},
SECOND_FROMCTRLID = #{secondFromctrlid},
SUM_ID = #{sumId},
UNFREEZE_MONEY = #{unfreezeMoney},
UNFREEZING_MONEY = #{unfreezingMoney},
USE_END_MONEY = #{useEndMoney},
USE_MONEY = #{useMoney},
USING_MONEY = #{usingMoney},
VERIFICATION_MONEY = #{verificationMoney},
VERIFICATIONING_MONEY = #{verificationingMoney},
YEAR = #{year},
where ID = #{id}
